name: GroceryList
description: Grocery List is a comprehensive, Marketplace on-demand online grocery ordering platform that empowers buyers in Canada, the USA, and the UK to shop for a wide range of products for their loved ones in Latin America and the Caribbean from local merchants
one_liner: Grocery List is a comprehensive, Marketplace on-demand online grocery ordering platform that empowers buyers in Canada, the USA, and the UK to shop for a wide range of products for their loved ones in Latin America and the Caribbean from local merchants
